Function Documentation

int collectInts ( int  a[],
int  num_elements,
int  max_value 
)

Take integer data from the user and store it into an array, stopping when the array gets full or a negative value is entered. It will reject any input values greater than the max value.

Parameters:
a[] The array to store the data in
num_elements[] The size of the array
max_value The maximum valid value of user input
Returns:
The number of data elements the user entered

int  num_elements 
)

Print an array of doubles, one per line

Parameters:
a[] An Array to print
num_elements The number of elements in the array

Print an array of ints, one per line.

num_elements Number of elements in the array
